name: QUESTionable Admin
description: This section is for administrative functions, including regaining lost reutation.

quests.name: ADMINISTRATION - JOB TITLE
quests.description: [Message from Caigan]                          Please only use this quest if you need to regain Job Title Rank after a quest reset.

quests.name: ADMINISTRATION - SHOP
quests.description: [Message from Caigan]                          Please only use this quest if you need to regain Shop Rank after a quest reset.

tasks.longDescription: You can only obtain this item through creative mode or NEI as an Op.

quests.name: ADMINISTRATION - TRADER
quests.description: [Message from Caigan]                          Please only use this quest if you need to regain Trader Rank after a quest reset.

tasks.longDescription: You can only obtain this item through creative mode or NEI as an Op.
